alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 31 at 9:16PM EDT until September 03 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Huron River Near Hamburg affecting Livingston County. For the Huron River...including Milford, Hamburg, Ann Arbor...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Huron River near Hamburg. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday morning and continue falling to 6.1 feet Thursday, September 7th. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Impact...At 7.5 feet, Flooding of houses and yards increase considerably. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=DTX. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 930 AM EDT.
